thread.title: and Kim celebrate Valentine's early with dinner date
thread.title_full: Kanye and Kim celebrate Valentine's early with dinner date | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: and Kim celebrate Valentine's early with dinner date
text:
Kim Kardashian and Kanye West appeared to have decided to celebrate Valentine's Day a little earlier this year.
The famous duo had a romantic date night at an Italian eatery after stopping off at celebrity hot spot Epione.
After dinner the pair then indulged at the iconic Baskin-Robbins.
Date night: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West decided to celebrate Valentine's Day a little earlier this year
Kim kept it low key in a pair of dark grey sweats, lace up black boots and an over sized grey and black coat.
She tied her famous raven locks back into a low ponytail as she went for a natural style of make-up.
The mother-of-two lightly contoured her face while adding some mascara and natural lippy.
Treating her: The famous duo had a romantic date night at an Italian eatery after stopping off at celebrity hot spot Epione
Strut like Kim Kardashian in Yeezy ankle boots £839 Yeezy lace up boots
In the sale for £587 at Stylebop
Buy now
Kim Kardashian may have a shoe collection that includes countless styles by high end designers like Manolo Blahnik, Gianvito Rossi, Balmain, Saint Laurent, Balenciaga and Sergio Rossi, but as you might expect, the brand that's getting the most space in her walk-in wardrobe is Yeezy.
She's either a very supportive wife or she genuinely loves Kanye West's footwear creations. But then she wouldn't be the only one as we've spotted everyone from Emily Ratajkowski to Brooklyn Beckham in them so he must be onto something.
We love the spike stiletto and pointed toe of this particular style. They're perfect for rocking with skinny jeans or would look killer with a floaty midi dress.
The good news is they're in the sale at Stylebop so why not click (right) to take a closer look? Or steal Kim's style at a fraction of the price with options by Public Desire, Simmi and more below.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET SOME BOOTS LIKE KIM'S £39.99 Public Desire lace up ankle boots

Laid back chic: Kim kept it low key in a pair of dark grey sweats, lace up black boots and an over sized grey and black coat
Kanye was laid back in a monochrome style outfit, opting to wear sweats and white hoodie.
The famous rapper was inadvertently engaged in a twitter mix up regarding President Trump.
King Myers released a song called Propaganda and used Kanye's Twitter avatar as his cover art.
Minimal effort: She tied her famous raven locks back into a low ponytail as she went for a natural style of make-up
Rockin' it: Kanye was laid back in a monochrome style outfit, opting to wear sweats and white hoodie
Simple: The mother-of-two lightly contoured her face while adding some mascara and natural lippy
He suggested that the track was produced by Yeezy.
The tweet comes at an interesting time as Kanye is now trying to distance himself from Trump
The Fade singer deleted all of his tweets defending his meeting with Trump back in December.
Hubby in trouble: The famous rapper was inadvertently engaged in a twitter mix up regarding President Trump
Look at that hair! Kim showed off her mermaid style locks in a long ponytail
Oops: King Myers released a song called Propaganda and used Kanye's Twitter avatar as his cover art
Kanye met with the President at Trump Tower in December and sent out a series of now-deleted tweets after receiving intense backlash from his fans.
'I wanted to meet with Trump today to discuss multicultural issues,' Kanye tweeted on December 13.
'I feel it is important to have a direct line of communication with our future President if we truly want change,' he said in a third tweet.
Backtracking: The Fade singer deleted all of his tweets defending his meeting with Trump back in December
Yummy: After dinner the pair then indulged at the iconic Baskin-Robbins
The criticism didn't seem to faze him at first as the day after he tweeted a picture a signed copy of TIME Magazine's Person of the Year issue with Trump on the front cover.
'To Kanye You are a great friend Thanks,' the front cover read, followed by Trump's signature.
That tweet has now been deleted as well.
In trouble: Kanye met with the President at Trump Tower in December and sent out a series of now-deleted tweets after receiving intense backlash from his fans
Friends? 'I wanted to meet with Trump today to discuss multicultural issues,' Kanye tweeted on December 13
Strong feelings: 'I feel it is important to have a direct line of communication with our future President if we truly want change,' he said in a third tweet
